Q_DESC:
Raja and sakthi plannig to design one echo machine
which replies name whatever name we are saying
as your name is.

Input

Name as Array

Output

your name
TESTCASE_1:
mahesh
###---###SEPERATOR---###---
Hi your name is mahesh
